game.name: Synergy Strike
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 협동, 스크린 공유 및 분할 협동, 공유 및 분할 화면, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 카메라 움직임 조정, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 수시 저장, 스테레오 사운드, 서라운드 사운드, HDR 사용 가능, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Flow into focus as power-ups fuse into Synergy Strikes that shatter swarms and boost scores. Chase combos, climb leaderboards, and unlock hypnotic audio reactive visuals that pulse with every beat. Collect tantalizing tails while vibing and gain a hefty score bank to level up your abilities.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Flow into focus as power-ups fuse into Synergy Strikes that shatter swarms and boost scores. Chase combos, climb leaderboards, and unlock hypnotic audio reactive visuals that pulse with every beat. Collect tantalizing tails while vibing and gain a hefty score bank to level up your abilities.
